alert.note: Alert for Dade; Greene; Lawrence; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:22PM CDT until April 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 322 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Willard, Mount Vernon, Ash Grove, Miller, Walnut Grove, Morrisville, Everton, Halltown, Chesapeake, Sacville, Brighton, Bois D`arc, Cave Springs, Eudora and Ebenezer. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 47 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
